metadata.title: CVE-2023-39128 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
GNU gdb (GDB) 13.0.50.20220805-git was discovered to contain a stackoverflow via the function ada_decode at /gdb/ada-lang.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdb-multiarch - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdb-source - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdbserver - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2').
